body_html: @j3ven7 I don't know whether it's a right solution or not. I combine 10 images to an numpy array and pass it to the predict function in my code. But the point is, I think tensorflow will reload the model in different run. Might not solve your problem? For reference only. 😄

body: @j3ven7 I don't know whether it's a right solution or not. I combine 10 images to an numpy array and pass it to the predict function in my code. But the point is, I think tensorflow will reload the model in different run. Might not solve your problem? For reference only. 😄
